_comment_info: BASIC CONFIGURATION - Settings most users will need to adjust
_comment_advanced: For advanced settings (folders, scraping, context extraction, etc.), see config.advanced.json
_comment_debug: true or false - enables debug logging to files
_comment_logging: Control console output by log level: DEBUG (technical details), INFORMATION (informational messages), WARNING (warnings/potential issues), ERROR (errors/failures)
_comment_two_step_processing: Two-step processing: use separate models for vision (Step 1: image description) and processing (Step 2: WCAG alt-text generation). Set to false to use single-step processing with vision_model only. This is the default for Basic mode in the web UI.
_comment_steps: Configure provider and model for each step. You can mix providers (e.g., Claude for vision, OpenAI for processing, ECB-LLM for translation)

openai._comment_enabled: Set to true to enable OpenAI provider (requires OPENAI_API_KEY). Set to false to disable.

claude._comment_enabled: Set to true to enable Claude provider (requires ANTHROPIC_API_KEY). Set to false to disable.

ecb_llm._comment_enabled: Set to true to enable ECB-LLM provider (requires ecb_llm_client package). Set to false to disable and prevent warning messages.

ollama._comment_enabled: Set to true to enable Ollama provider (requires ollama package and running Ollama server). Set to false to disable and prevent warning messages.
ollama._comment_available_models_vision: Ollama vision models: qwen3-vl (Alibaba Qwen3-VL multimodal model, recommended), granite3.2-vision (IBM Granite 3.2 with vision), llama3.2-vision (Meta Llama 3.2 with vision), llava (LLaVA multimodal model), moondream (lightweight vision model)
ollama._comment_available_models_processing: Ollama text models: qwen2.5 (Alibaba Qwen 2.5, recommended), phi3 (Microsoft Phi-3 3.8B, fast and efficient), mistral (Mistral 7B), llama3.2 (Meta Llama 3.2 3B)
ollama._comment_available_models_translation: Ollama translation models: Same as processing models - qwen2.5 (recommended, good for non-Latin scripts), phi3 (fast), mistral, llama3.2

gemini._comment_enabled: Set to true to enable Google Gemini provider (requires google-generativeai package and GEMINI_API_KEY). Set to false to disable and prevent warning messages.
gemini._comment_available_models: Gemini models: gemini-2.0-flash-exp (latest experimental model, fast, multimodal), gemini-1.5-pro (production-ready, multimodal), gemini-1.5-flash (faster, lighter)

_comment_translation_mode: translation_mode: 'fast' (generate once in first language, then translate) or 'accurate' (generate fresh alt-text for each language). 'fast' is recommended for cost/speed.
_comment_prompt: Prompt template configuration: processing_files (list of processing prompt files), default_processing_prompt (fallback), vision_files (list of vision prompt files), default_vision_prompt (fallback), translation_files (list of translation prompt files), default_translation_prompt (fallback). For merge_separator setting, see config.advanced.json
_comment_batch_comparison: Batch prompt comparison for AI engineers: test_geo_boost=true generates BOTH GEO and non-GEO versions for each image+prompt combination, test_geo_boost=false generates only standard WCAG alt-text
